name: In the Eye of the Storm
name_original: In the Eye of the Storm
description:
Lead Designer and Project Manager: Jaynel Dugos
Lead Programmer and Sound Designer: Pierre Chua
Lead Artist: Justine Fabian
Mechanics and UI Programmer: Paolo Arevalo and Marvin Mendoza

Adviser: Christian Arriola

It is that time of the year again, various typhoons hit the country. For many years now it has been like various typhoons and storms come and go. Prepare before the storm, survive during the onslaught, and Witness the Aftermath. Can you survive this storm-filled month?

Research and Documentation Link:
